message.body: $TSLA the true cost is closer to $30,000 when you account for federal tax incentives, state rebates, and savings on gas.https://qz.com/1431122/elon-musk-is-too-ambitious-for-teslas-own-good/

links.title: Elon Musk is too ambitious for Tesla's own good
links.description: In April, Elon Musk admitted Tesla shot itself in the foot by attempting to overly automate its production process. "Humans are underrated," he tweeted. Tesla got there because Musk had ordered engineers to figure out how to "automate everything" for Model 3 production, the electric car he'd pledged to sell on the mass market for $35,000.

links.description: Tesla used to be a nice and considerate young company, easing its way into a ginormous automobile ocean in which it sold one and then two guppies - the Model S and Model X. links.title: Audi's E-tron SUV will be delayed to regulatory approval over a software update
links.description: In September, Audi revealed the final production version of its forthcoming electronic SUV, the E-tron, which is due out sometime next year. The wait for the car looks as although it'll take a little longer as Audi is delaying the vehicle's release by four weeks due to a software issue.
